mapper.select: select * from user where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw};
select * from ${board_name} order by board_num desc limit #{limitindex}, 20;
select * from ${board_name} where ${s_type} like #{s_key} order by board_num desc limit #{limitindex}, 20;
select * from product where p_best is not null;
select distinct ifnull(p_size,"no") as p_size from stockmanage where p_code = #{value};
select distinct ifnull(p_color,"no") as p_color from stockmanage where p_code = #{value};
select distinct ifnull(p_gear,"no") as p_gear from stockmanage where p_code = #{value};
mapper.insert: insert into ${board_name} (nick, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_good, board_view, board_image, board_file) values(#{nick}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, now(), 0, 0, #{board_image}, #{board_file});

insert into user (id, pw, name, nick, birth, email, tel, sex, addr, addr1, addr2, addr3, b_have, f_bike, sms) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{sex}, #{addr}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{addr3}, #{b_have}, #{f_bike}, #{sms});
mapper.update: update ${board_name} set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_file = #{board_file}, board_image = #{board_image} where board_num = #{board_num};
update ${board_name} set board_good = board_good+1 where board_num = #{board_num};
update ${board_name} set board_view = board_view+1 where board_num = #{board_num};
